DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the investigators study is to investigate the factors associated with rebleeding in patients with peptic ulcer bleeding.
DOC.brief_title: Risk Factors of Rebleeding After Peptic Ulcer Bleeding: a Nationwide Cohort Study
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators are performing a nationwide population based cohort study to investigate the factors associated with rebleeding in patients with peptic ulcer bleeding. The results of the investigators study should give us information about patients who are at high risk of rebleeindg and enable us to manage these patients appropriately.
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosed with peptic ulcer bleeding by endoscopy Patients who consent to be enrolled in the study Patients who refuse to be enrolled in the study
